thread.title: India Defeat Bangladesh By 50 Runs in ICC T20 World Cup 2024 Super 8; Hardik Pandya, Kuldeep Yadav Power IND to Dominant Win Over BAN
thread.title_full: India Defeat Bangladesh By 50 Runs in ICC T20 World Cup 2024 Super 8; Hardik Pandya, Kuldeep Yadav Power IND to Dominant Win Over BAN

author: @latestly
title: India Defeat Bangladesh By 50 Runs in ICC T20 World Cup 2024 Super 8; Hardik Pandya, Kuldeep Yadav Power IND to Dominant Win Over BAN
text: Indian Cricket Team continue their winning run as they beat Bangladesh by 50 runs in the ICC T20 World Cup 2024 Super 8 encounter. This is their fifth win in the competition and with it they have now almost sealed a spot in the semifinal with two wins and a good net run rate. Batting first, Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli gave India a flying start. Rishabh Pant carried it on although in the middle overs India struggled to get going for a moment. But Hardik Pandya and Shivam Dube's strong finish powered India to a big total of 196/5. Tanzim Hasan Sakib and Rishad Hossain picked two wickets each. Chasing it, Bangladesh were steady and cautious at the start but struggled to accelerate against the quality bowling of India and in the end stopped well ahead of the finishing line on 146/8. Fans can get the India National Cricket Team vs Bangladesh National Cricket Team match scorecard here. If Australia defeats Afghanistan, India and Australia will quality from Group 1. Virat Kohli Becomes First Batsman to Score 3000 Runs Across ODI and T20 World Cups, Achieves Feat During IND vs BAN T20 WC 2024 Super 8 Match.
